text:
We are USA-UES | ONSITE | Los Angeles, CA | Full-time | Project Managers, Frontend Developers, Backend Software Engineers

Our mission is to guide children to success in college and beyond.

Want to make huge impact on education? Do you want to grow with a great company opening a huge market? Join us to secure the future of our kids today!

Our stack is PHP (Laravel, Vue.js), AWS, and other technologies.

https://usaues.bamboohr.com/jobs/
